languages.text: {n}Бомбардировка мегатонными снарядами стерла мануфакторум в прах. Эпидемия прекратилась, однако потеря величественных цехов сказалась на производственных мощностях мира.{/n}
{n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бомбардировка мегатонными снарядами стерла мануфакторум в прах. Эпидемия прекратилась, однако потеря величественных цехов сказалась на производственных мощностях мира.{/n}

{n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}几颗百万吨级核弹砸在了制造工厂上，将其夷为平地。疫病消退了，但由于大型车间被摧毁了，这个世界的生产能力也受到了影响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}几颗百万吨级核弹砸在了制造工厂上，将其夷为平地。疫病消退了，但由于大型车间被摧毁了，这个世界的生产能力也受到了影响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El bombardeo con proyectiles de megatones arrasó el manufactorum. La epidemia había remitido, pero la pérdida de los grandes talleres afectó a la capacidad de producción del mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El bombardeo con proyectiles de megatones arrasó el manufactorum. La epidemia había remitido, pero la pérdida de los grandes talleres afectó a la capacidad de producción del mundo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}メガトン砲を使った砲撃により、聖工場は全壊した。伝染病は沈静化したが、広大な工房を失ったことで惑星の生産能力に影響が及んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}メガトン砲を使った砲撃により、聖工場は全壊した。伝染病は沈静化したが、広大な工房を失ったことで惑星の生産能力に影響が及んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le bombardement d'ogives atomiques réduit le manufactorum à néant. L'épidémie est éradiquée, mais la perte de ces éminents ateliers grève les capacités de production de la planète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bombardement d'ogives atomiques réduit le manufactorum à néant. L'épidémie est éradiquée, mais la perte de ces éminents ateliers grève les capacités de production de la planète.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Manufactorum wurde durch die Bombardierung mit Megatonnenladungen ausgelöscht. Die Epidemie ist eingedämmt, doch der Verlust der großen Werkstätten hat die Produktionskapazität der Welt beeinträchtigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Manufactorum wurde durch die Bombardierung mit Megatonnenladungen ausgelöscht. Die Epidemie ist eingedämmt, doch der Verlust der großen Werkstätten hat die Produktionskapazität der Welt beeinträchtigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Üzerine yağan megatonluk bombaların ardından manufaktorum yerle bir oldu. Salgın dindirildi ancak büyük atölyelerin kaybıyla dünyadaki üretim kapasitesi de düştü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bombardment with megaton shells wiped the manufactorum out. The epidemic had subsided, but the loss of the grand workshops affected the production capacity of the world.{/n}
